name: express-create-react-app-starter
description: Create a react app and express server w/ docker-compose
author: Ted Kulp <ted@tedkulp.com>

scripts.dev: pwd && concurrently "pwd && cd frontend && BROWSER=none PORT=5000 yarn start" "pwd && cd backend && ./wait-for-services.sh && ./node_modules/.bin/nodemon index.js" "pwd && docker-compose up"
scripts.dev-build: pwd && concurrently "pwd && cd frontend && BROWSER=none PORT=5000 yarn start" "pwd && cd backend && ./wait-for-services.sh && ./node_modules/.bin/nodemon index.js" "pwd && docker-compose up --build"
